original_text: I will send you away as prisoners. Your enemies will take you beyond Damascus.’ That is what the Lord says, and he is God Almighty. I will send you away as prisoners. Your enemies will take you beyond Damascus.’ That is what the Lord says, and he is God Almighty. I will send you away as prisoners. Your enemies will take you beyond Damascus.’
korean_text: 내가 너희를 다메섹 밖으로 사로잡혀 가게 하리라 그의 이름이 만군의 하나님이라 불리우는 여호와께서 말씀하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: I will send you away as prisoners.
Your enemies will take you beyond Damascus.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 원수들이 너희를 다메석 너머로 데려가리라.

sentences.original_text: That is what the Lord says,
I will send you away as prisoners.
Your enemies will take you beyond Damascus.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 원수들이 너희를 다메석 너머로 데려가리라.

sentences.original_text: That is what the Lord says,
I will send you away as prisoners.
Your enemies will take you beyond Damascus.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 원수들이 너희를 다메석 너머로 데려가리라.
